ISSUE.TITLE: Incorrect APP_NAME on macOS
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Describe the bug The window name when right-clicking the app in the Dock on macOS shows as "APP_NAME". ### To reproduce 1. Install LocalSend on macOS 2. Open it 3. Right-click the app icon in the Dock 4. The incorrect name "APP_NAME" gets displayed ### Expected behavior "LocalSend" or a relevant name or status indication should be displayed. ### Screenshots ![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/81e4d3eb-07d6-495c-ac92-a42a278f5668) ### Desktop (please complete the following information) - OS: macOS 12.7.6 - App version: 1.16.1 ### Smartphone (please complete the following information) _No response_ ### Additional context _No response_

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix incorrect APP_NAME on macOS Fixes #2059 Fix the incorrect window name "APP_NAME" on macOS. * Update `app/macos/Runner/Base.lproj/MainMenu.xib` to change the `CFBundleDisplayName` key to "LocalSend". * Add `CFBundleDisplayName` key with value "LocalSend" in `app/macos/ShareExtension/Info.plist`. --- For more details, open the [Copilot Workspace session](https://copilot-workspace.githubnext.com/localsend/localsend/issues/2059?shareId=XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX).
